name: Maths Game (Rainsong)
description:
Posted here as an experiment prior to the Tool Jam, this game is just an expanded version of a simple course project.

Choose an arithmetic function, press the 'start game' button, and a pseudo-randomly generated arithmetic problem will appear. Choose the correct answer from the four buttons below the problem. If you choose the correct one, a new problem will appear. If not, you'll see a "try again" message.

Each game is timed, with a two-minute countdown. And each correct answer gives one point. The idea is to get as many points as possible in the two minutes.

HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using Visual Studio Code

(The course project in question is section 6 of

https://www.udemy.com/course/complete-web-development-course
'The Complete 2022 Web Development Course - Build  15 Projects' by EduMobile, and the expansion is the addition of the 'addition', 'subtraction', and 'division' options)
